The key feature is to be able to visit the options and be able to update addons from the menu.

comments.text:
Created attachment 522049
Mockup for the addons split menu

Here is what I'm thinking of:

1. only enabled addons should be shown. name AND version number
2. "info | home | update | options" button bar should all be aligned for every addon.
3. Button labels should be icons instead of text.

"info" is goes to the "More" page in the addons UI.
"home" goes to whatever is the home page for the addon
"update" checks for updates
"options" goes to the options for the addon (if any).
